Detailed Description

A matrix of image cells with reordering.

This calls allows you to create a matrix of image cells that can be reordered (similar to object in an outline view). To use this class add it to your project. In InterfaceBuilder create a matrix of ImageViews. In the properties pane go to custom class and set the class to DragMatrix. When a image is dragged this class sends a notification "DragMatrixImageMoved". The object is itself. The user info contains the following keys

  • "images" = Selected DicomImages
